definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: Heat oil. Add Chng Kee's Sambal Belacan Chilli Paste and stir-fry until fragrant.
sentences.chinese: 用熱油翻炒莊記參芭芭拉煎辣椒醬至香味溢出。

sentences.english: But Barbara Fick says stored onions need to be cured first.
sentences.chinese: 但芭芭拉說菲克存儲蔥需要先治癒。

sentences.english: Barbara and Raynor stopped dancing and went across to Lucia at the door.
sentences.chinese: 芭芭拉和雷諾停住了跳舞，穿過露西婭走到門邊。

sentences.english: Barbara Bush, Jenna's twin, is the maid of honor.
sentences.chinese: 詹娜的雙胞胎姐姐芭芭拉將擔任伴娘。

sentences.english: I am frightened, and hurriedly fled the bedroom of my sister Barbara's .
sentences.chinese: 我嚇壞了，趕緊逃向了我妹妹芭芭拉的臥室中。

sentences.english: Barbara really enjoys working at the bank.
sentences.chinese: 芭芭拉確實喜歡在銀行工作。
芭芭拉普萊特，伊斯蘭堡報道。

sentences.english: During the evening there were performances from Alexander Acha and Ana Barbara.
sentences.chinese: 在晚上有從亞歷山大阿查和安娜芭芭拉表演。

sentences.english: He is also married to my step-sister Barbara.
sentences.chinese: 他也娶了我的姐姐芭芭拉。

sentences.english: Prof. Barbara L. Fredrickson is coming to visit us this summer.
sentences.chinese: 屬弗雷德裏克森教授芭芭拉是來參觀我們這個夏天。

sentences.english: Riding a bicycle in Santa Barbara, California, 1933.
sentences.chinese: 1933年在加州聖芭芭拉騎自行車。

sentences.english: Raisa and I send to you and Barbara our very best wishes.
sentences.chinese: 賴莎和我向你與芭芭拉致以最美好的祝願。

sentences.english: So we can say, Barbra is an evergreen.
sentences.chinese: 形容芭芭拉藝術生命如常青樹那樣。

sentences.english: From her own point of view Barbara had behaved abominably.
sentences.chinese: 在她看來，芭芭拉的表現是惡劣的。

sentences.english: The blaze's already destroyed more than 100 homes in Santa Barbara County.
sentences.chinese: 在聖塔芭芭拉郡，大火已經破壞掉至少100所民房。

sentences.english: "It's better than doing nothing," says Barbara.
sentences.chinese: “這比什麼都不做要好，”芭芭拉說。

definition: Michel or Mitchell (name)/George Mitchell (1933-), US Democratic party politician and diplomat, influential in brokering Northern Ireland peace deal in 1990s, US Middle East special envoy from 2009
Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
